executive_summary:
BNN Feasibility Analysis - Executive Summary
============================================

Overall Feasibility Score: 0.552 (MEDIUM)

Recommendation: Proceed with caution, consider alternatives

Key Findings:
- Data Sufficiency: 1.000
- Predictability: 0.297
- Noise Characteristics: 0.025
- Nonlinearity: 0.625

Assessment: BNN shows moderate potential with careful implementation

Next Steps: Implement hybrid approach with BNN for specific roles

current_bnn_role.description: Ensemble of MLPRegressor for uncertainty quantification
current_bnn_role.outputs: ROI and risk predictions with uncertainty bounds
limitations: Not a true Bayesian Neural Network
Uses deterministic ensemble instead of variational inference

role_1_portfolio_weight_prediction.inputs: Market features, historical weights, risk factors
challenges: May not capture market dynamics well

role_2_return_risk_prediction.description: Predict asset returns and risk with uncertainty
role_2_return_risk_prediction.inputs: Market features, technical indicators, macro factors
advantages: Can integrate with existing portfolio optimization
challenges: Financial data is notoriously hard to predict

role_3_market_regime_detection.description: Detect market regimes and adjust predictions accordingly
challenges: Regime changes are hard to detect in real-time

enhanced_kalman_filter.description: Improve existing Kalman filter with better state space models
enhanced_kalman_filter.implementation: Extend current Kalman filter with regime-switching or time-varying parameters

gaussian_process_regression.description: Use Gaussian Processes for return/risk prediction
challenges: May not scale well with large datasets

ensemble_methods.description: Improve current ensemble with better base models
ensemble_methods.implementation: Combine Kalman filter, ARIMA, and other time series models

with_tip_calculation.description: Use BNN to improve TIP (Temporal Incomparability Probability) calculation
with_tip_calculation.approach: BNN predicts future objective distributions for TIP calculation
with_tip_calculation.benefits: More accurate TIP, better anticipatory learning

with_belief_coefficient.description: Use BNN uncertainty to adjust belief coefficients
with_belief_coefficient.approach: BNN uncertainty directly influences belief coefficient calculation
with_belief_coefficient.benefits: Dynamic belief adjustment based on prediction confidence

with_dirichlet_model.description: Use BNN to predict Dirichlet concentration parameters
with_dirichlet_model.approach: BNN learns optimal concentration parameters for different market conditions
with_dirichlet_model.benefits: Adaptive Dirichlet model, better portfolio weight predictions

data_sufficiency.interpretation: Higher is better - more assets have sufficient data for BNN training

predictability.interpretation: Higher is better - more predictable patterns in the data

noise_characteristics.interpretation: Higher is better - cleaner signal relative to noise

nonlinearity.interpretation: Higher is better - more complex patterns that BNN can capture

implementation_order: Implement BNN for regime detection only
Use BNN uncertainty to enhance existing methods
